channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - migrate

item.title: Migrating to SELinux userspace 2.4 (small warning for users)
item.description: In a few moments, SELinux users which have the \~arch KEYWORDS set (either globally or for the SELinux utilities in particular) will notice that the SELinux userspace will upgrade to version 2.4 (release candidate 5 for now). This upgrade comes with a manual step that needs to be performed â€¦
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
